tool_description: Accurately detect and filter out offensive and inappropriate language from user-generated content with a simple API call.
name: Bad words detector
title: Bad words detector

api_list.name: Check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bad-words-detector.p.rapidapi.com/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bad-words-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bad-words-detector.p.rapidapi.com/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bad-words-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
